plot: A comedy mini TV series that teaches viewers what NOT to do when they get their first job. This real world portrayal of the workplace can teach anyone simple lessons to keep their job, and not get fired. Wackiness ensues.
plot_en: A comedy mini TV series that teaches viewers what NOT to do when they get their first job. This real world portrayal of the workplace can teach anyone simple lessons to keep their job, and not get fired. Wackiness ensues.

title: First Jobs
